serene.validation.schema.active.components
Class ActiveComponentBuilder

java.lang.Object
  serene.validation.schema.active.components.ActiveComponentBuilder
All Implemented Interfaces:
ComponentBuilder
public class ActiveComponentBuilder
extends java.lang.Object
implements ComponentBuilder

Builds components, the big picture ActiveModel is the directors responsibility. Can return/remove the components of the current level(usefull for attaching commands). Can check if the current level is top level.
